Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Rocky IV
Description: Rocky trains his friend Apollo Creed in a match against Drago, an indestructible Russian boxer. But when Apollo is killed in the ring during the match, Rocky vows to avenge his friend's death.

Genre.Name: Sport
Genre.Description: A sports genre is a film that uses sport as theme.

Director.Name: Sylvester Stallone
Director.Bio: Sylvester Enzio Stallone is an American actor and filmmaker.

Title: John Rambo
Description: Rambo helps a team of Christian missionaries enter Burma to help suffering villagers. However, when the missionaries get captured by Burmese soldiers, Rambo sets out to rescue them.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action film is a film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence and physical feats.

Director.Name: Sylvester Stallone
Director.Bio: Sylvester Enzio Stallone is an American actor and filmmaker.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: In the realm of underworld, a series of incidents intertwines the lives of two Los Angeles mobsters, a gangster's wife, a boxer and two small-time criminals.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: Crime fiction is the genre of fiction that deals with crimes, their detection, criminals, and their motives.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Jerome Tarantino is an American filmmaker and actor. His films are characterized by frequent references to popular culture and film genres, nonlinear storylines, dark humor, stylized violence, extended dialogue, pervasive use of profanity, cameos and ensemble casts

Title: Django Unchained
Description: When Django, a slave, is freed, he joins forces with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife, who has been enslaved by Calvin, a hard-hearted plantation owner.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: The drama genre features stories with high stakes and a lot of conflicts. They are plot-driven and demand that every character and scene move the story forward. Dramas follow a clearly defined narrative plot structure, portraying real-life scenarios or extreme situations with emotionally-driven characters.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Jerome Tarantino is an American filmmaker and actor. His films are characterized by frequent references to popular culture and film genres, nonlinear storylines, dark humor, stylized violence, extended dialogue, pervasive use of profanity, cameos and ensemble casts

Title: Once Upon A Time...In Hollywood
Description: Rick, a washed-out actor, and Cliff, his stunt double, struggle to recapture fame and success in 1960s Los Angeles. Meanwhile, living next door to Rick is Sharon Tate and her husband Roman Polanski.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: The drama genre features stories with high stakes and a lot of conflicts. They are plot-driven and demand that every character and scene move the story forward. Dramas follow a clearly defined narrative plot structure, portraying real-life scenarios or extreme situations with emotionally-driven characters.

Title: Rocky Balboa
Description: A retired Rocky Balboa wins against reigning champion Mason Dixon in a computer simulation of a fight. Enraged by this, Mason challenges Rocky to a 10-round exhibition bout.

Genre.Description: A sports genre is a film that uses sport as theme.

Title: The Expandables
Description: A CIA's mercenary team is ordered to assassinate the dictator of a South American island without knowing that their mission is viciously planned by a vindictive CIA officer, James Monroe.

Genre.Name: Action

Director.Name: Sylvester Stallone

Title: Jurassic Park
Description: John Hammond, an entrepreneur, opens a wildlife park containing cloned dinosaurs. However, a breakdown of the island's security system causes the creatures to escape and bring about chaos.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, interstellar travel or other technologies.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Allan Spielberg is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Jaws
Description: A police chief and three other members, spring into action after a white shark terrorises the inhabitants of Amity.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller is a genre of fiction, having numerous, often overlapping subgenres. Thrillers are characterized and defined by the moods they elicit, giving viewers heightened feelings of suspense, excitement, surprise, anticipation and anxiety.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Spielberg is an American producer and screenwriter.
